MICHIGAN FAMILY INDEPENDENCE AGENCY
OFFICE OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB630246843
Licensee Name: Morning Star Adoption Resource Services,
Inc.
Licensee Address: 15635 W. Twelve Mile Rd., Suite 100
Southfield, MI 48076
Licensee Telephone #: (248) 483-5484
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Janis Weaver
Name of Facility: Morning Star Adoption Center
Facility Address: 15635 W. Twelve Mile Rd., Suite 100
Southfield, MI 48076
Facility Telephone #: (248) 483-5484
Capacity: NA
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Morning Star Adoption Center has moved to a new location.
III. Methodology
07/09/2004- A Child Placing Agency Application to change the address of the facility
was received. The Chief Administrator advised that the official move date is
11/01/2004.
08/18/2004- An onsite inspection of the new Agency location was conducted.
10/26/2004- A message was received from the Chief Administrator confirming that
the Agency is moving to the new location and will be operating from that location
effective 11/01/2004.
10/27/2004- The change of address was completed by Central Office. The Office of
Children and Adult Licensing no longer requires a new license number and a
provisional license when a Child Placing Agency moves to a new location.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Morning Star Adoption Center (MSAC) is moving to a new location effective
11/01/2004. The new location is 15635 W. Twelve Mile Rd, Suite 100, Southfield, MI
48076, telephone number 248-483-5484. The new building is in close proximity to
the previous location, but offers additional space.
An Onsite Inspection was conducted by the Licensing Consultant on August 18,
2004. The Agency will be located on the first floor of a two story building. The new
location has a reception area, conference rooms, and individual office space. The
telephone number remains the same and the office equipment will be transferred to
the new location. The location remains close to public transportation.
The Agency’s program remains the same. The Agency continues to provide foster
care and adoptive services. A Renewal Evaluation was conducted in August 2004
and the Agency was issued a Regular License, effective 10/02/2004-10/01/2006.
V. Recommendation
It is recommended that Morning Star Adoption Center continue on a Regular
License.
________________________________________
Miriam Berenstein Date
Licensing Consultant
2
